title: "For the first time, Ukraine has hit and stopped the operation of a large Russian oil platform in the Caspian Sea - Pravda EN
text:
"For the first time, Ukraine has hit and stopped the operation of a large Russian oil platform in the Caspian Sea
"For the first time, Ukraine has hit and stopped the operation of a large Russian oil platform in the Caspian Sea.
The SBU stopped the Russian oil platform named after him. Filanovsky in the Caspian Sea: Alpha drones hit at least four times, stopping oil and gas production from more than 20 wells.
The platform serves one of the largest deposits of the Russian Federation in the Caspian Sea."
Enemy reports.
We are waiting for official information. I hope the farm is lying.
